title: Building A Brand In 2021 w/ Donny Deutsch
description:
When marketing guru Donny Deutsch talks, you should listen.

Whether youâ€™re trying to build a business or simply grow your personal brand, Donnyâ€™s got tons of insights you need to hear.

Iâ€™ve been fascinated by Donny and followed him for many, many years. Heâ€™s one of the SMARTEST people Iâ€™ve ever talked with.

Donny built Deutsch Inc. into a multi-billion dollar marketing communications company with a roster of blue-chip clients like Johnson & Johnson, Mitsubishi, Revlon, Expedia, and many others. Donny also hosted the CNBC talk show â€œThe Big Idea with Donny Deutschâ€ and wrote the best sellers, â€œOften Wrong, Never in Doubtâ€ and â€œTHE BIG IDEA: How to Make Your Entrepreneurial Dreams Come True from the AHA Moment to Your First Million.â€

In this episode, Donny will blow you away with why social media has to be a part of your game plan and why focusing on MILLENIALS should figure heavily into your outreach. He shares what motivates them and how you can leverage this info to get them to ENGAGE with your business.

We also jump into why having a driving hunger, passionate CURIOSITY, and a â€œWhy not me?â€ attitude is essential if you want to succeed in life.

And I think youâ€™ll be surprised at what we both have to say about what money can and canâ€™t do for you. Hintâ€¦itâ€™s good to be wealthy, but that doesnâ€™t necessarily mean youâ€™re going to be HAPPIER unless you learn how to USE YOUR MONEY THE RIGHT WAY.

You owe it to yourself to listen to what Donny has to say. Youâ€™ll walk away with a boatload of new ideas that will make you think for days to come.

Be sure to share this one with your friends and family.

Theyâ€™ll definitely want to hear what Donny has to say, too.
